sources.name: Oil&Gas Employment - US Bureau of Labor Statistics
sources.description:
Data published by United States Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS)
Link https://data.bls.gov/timeseries/CES1021100001?data_tool=XGtable
Retrieved 2017-07-11

Dataset from BLS includes all employees working in oil & gas extraction in the United States.

sources.name: Oil & Gas Rig Count- Baker Hughes
sources.description:
Data published by Baker Hughes- General Electric (GE) company
Link http://phx.corporate-ir.net/phoenix.zhtml?c=79687&p=irol-rigcountsintl
Retrieved 2017-07-11

Baker Hughes publish historical and current statistics on international and regional count on oil & gas rigs. Here we have included only statistics on oil & gas rigs in the United States.
